newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $71.00 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $71.00 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Ppanhandle area early Monday. Slaughter steers and heifers steady in a light test. Feedlots reporting light inquiry.

Sales reported on 200 slaughter steers and 100 heifers; 5,700 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 1,500 head of 41 loads of CME cattle delivered to area packing plants. Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1150 lbs 71.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-3 1150 lbs 70.00. Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 71.00.Z Confirmed - 300.
